data.name: Chess Variants - Omnichess
data.detailed_description:
Omnichess is the game that allows you to design and play your very own chess variants! With AI and online play there are a huge variety of options including:

üë´ 2 - 8 players. All against all or team based play.

‚≠ê Square, hexagonal, or triangular tiled boards with a board editor that allows you to choose the size and disable tiles allowing the creation of novel board shapes.

ü•á Win conditions including Checkmate, Play for points, Tile capture, and Annihilation.

‚ôü Fun rule alterations like enabling en passant on bishops or castling on any pair of pieces!

üëæ Define how a piece moves and choose from over 40 piece icons

‚åõ Interval, Bronstein, and Hour Glass timers

üïì Asymmetric move timers. Give yourself extra move time against a more experienced player to even the odds.

data.short_description: Omnichess is the game that allows you to design and play your very own chess variants! With AI and online play there are a huge variety of options.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.12
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
